channel.title: Research on Velat Kilic
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Velat Kilic

item.title: Time Lens Photon Doppler Velocimetry (TL-PDV)
item.description: Experiment: Kilic, V., DiMarco, C.S., Diamond, J., Chu, P., Ramesh, K.T., Wang, Z. and Foster, M.A., 2023, March. Experimental demonstration of time lens photon Doppler velocimetry (TL-PDV). In Real-time Measurements, Rogue Phenomena, and Single-Shot Applications VIII (Vol. 12406, pp. 16-19). SPIE. Theory: Chu, P., Kilic, V., Foster, M.A. and Wang, Z., 2021. Time-lens photon Doppler velocimetry (TL-PDV). Review of Scientific Instruments, 92(4), p.044703.

item.title: Computational Imaging and Sensing
item.description: Compressed Sensing Kilic, V., Tran, T.D. and Foster, M.A., 2023. Compressed sensing in photonics: tutorial. JOSA B, 40(1), pp.28-52. On-chip Spectroscopy Irvine, D.A., Kilic, V., Petrillo, K.G., Foster, M.A. and Foster, A.C., 2022, May. Evanescently coupled multimode silicon nitride waveguides for on chip spectroscopy. In 2022 Conference on Lasers and Electro-Optics (CLEO) (pp. 1-2). IEEE. Microscopy Shin, J., Kilic, V. and Foster, M.A., 2020, May. Fast and Wide Field-of-View Microscopy using a Coded Aperture.

item.title: Object Detection and Segmentation
item.description: 3D Object Detection Under Adverse Weather Conditions Kilic, V., Hegde, D., Sindagi, V., Cooper, A.B., Foster, M.A. and Patel, V.M., 2021. Lidar light scattering augmentation (lisa): Physics-based simulation of adverse weather conditions for 3d object detection. arXiv preprint arXiv:2107.07004. Hegde, D., Sindagi, V., Kilic, V., Cooper, A.B., Foster, M. and Patel, V., 2021. Uncertainty-aware mean teacher for source-free unsupervised domain adaptive 3d object detection. arXiv preprint arXiv:2109.14651. Unsupervised Object Detection in XPCI for Materials Science

item.title: Optical Computing
item.description: Feedback Alignment Kilic, V. and Foster, M.A., 2021, May. Training photonic extreme learning machines using feedback alignment. In 2021 Conference on Lasers and Electro-Optics (CLEO) (pp. 1-2). IEEE.

item.title: Non-degenerate Two-wave Mixing (NDWTM)
item.description: Kilic, V. and Lawandy, N.M., 2019. High density colloidal particle flux using modulated nondegenerate counter-propagating optical beams. Optics Communications, 433, pp.155-158. Smuk, A.Y., Kilic, V., Umyskov, A. and Lawandy, N.M., 2018. Dynamical studies of non-degenerate two-wave mixing. Optics Communications, 420, pp.211-214.
